terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Rizzflows, a mobile application (the "App") operated by ADSEGOM LTD ("Company," "we," "us," "our"). These Terms of Service (the "Legal Terms") govern your access to and use of the App, as well as any other related products or services that reference or link to these Legal Terms (collectively, the "Services"). You agree that by accessing or using the Services, you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by all of these Legal Terms. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE WITH ALL OF THESE LEGAL TERMS, YOU ARE EXPRESSLY PROHIBITED FROM USING THE SERVICES AND YOU MUST DISCONTINUE USE IMMEDIATELY.
terms.p1: These Legal Terms constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity ("you"), and ADSEGOM LTD, concerning your access to and use of the Services. The App is intended for users who are at least 18 years old. Persons under the age of 18 are not permitted to use or register for the Services. By using the Services, you represent and warrant that you have the legal capacity and agree to comply with these Legal Terms.
terms.p1_li1: • You have the legal capacity and agree to comply with these Legal Terms.
terms.p1_li2: • You are not a minor in the jurisdiction in which you reside.
terms.p1_li3: • You will not access the Services through automated or non-human means (bots, scripts).
terms.p1_li4: • You will not use the Services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms.h2: 2. Description of Our Services and AI Disclaimer
terms.p2: Rizzflows is an Artificial Intelligence-powered dating assistant designed to help users generate reply suggestions, pickup lines, and advice for social situations ("Services"). The App allows users to upload conversation screenshots or text inputs to receive AI-generated content using third-party technologies.
terms.h2_disclaimer_text: The content generated by Rizzflows is powered by Artificial Intelligence. The AI may make mistakes, "hallucinate," or produce content that could be considered offensive, inappropriate, or ineffective in certain contexts.
terms.p2_li1: • We do not guarantee the accuracy, effectiveness, or safety of the advice provided.
terms.p2_li2: • You are solely responsible for reviewing any message generated by the App before sending it.
terms.p2_li3: • ADSEGOM LTD is not responsible for any social consequences, relationship issues, or misunderstandings resulting from the use of our suggestions.
terms.p3: Rizzflows offers digital goods (e.g., "Credits") and subscriptions (e.g., "PREMIUM Access") through the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
terms.p3_sub1_text: You agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information. Transactions are processed by the respective app store. All payments will be in the currency charged by Apple or Google.
terms.p3_sub2_text: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period in your device's account settings. You authorize recurring charges to your payment method until you cancel the corresponding order.
terms.p3_sub3_text: All purchases are non-refundable. Refund requests must be made through Apple or Google in accordance with their policies. Purchased Credits are non-refundable and non-transferable. To cancel a subscription, go to the subscription settings in iCloud (Apple) or your Google account (Android).
terms.p4: We are the owner or the licensee of all intellectual property rights in our Services, including all source code, databases, functionality, website designs, Content, and Trademarks. The Content and Marks are provided "AS IS" for your personal, non-commercial use only. You may not copy, reproduce, republish, upload, post, publicly display, encode, translate, transmit, distribute, sell, or otherwise exploit the Content or Marks for any commercial purpose without our express prior written permission.
terms.p4_sub_text: We grant you a revocable, non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited right to install and use the Application on wireless electronic devices owned or controlled by you. You shall not decompile, reverse engineer, or use the Application to create a competitive product.
terms.p5: The Services may allow you to create, submit, post, or distribute content and materials ("Contributions"). By submitting Submissions to the App, you agree to assign to us all intellectual property rights in such Submission.
terms.p5_sub_text: By posting your Contributions, you automatically grant us an unrestricted, irrevocable, perpetual, non-exclusive, transferable, royalty-free right to host, use, copy, and distribute such Contributions. You are solely responsible for your Contributions and warrant that they do not infringe any proprietary rights of third parties.
terms.p6: You agree not to use the Services for any purpose other than that for which the Services are made available. The following activities are strictly prohibited:
terms.p6_li1: • Systematically retrieve data or other content to create databases or directories without our written permission.
terms.p6_li2: • Trick, defraud, or mislead other users, or attempt to obtain confidential information.
terms.p6_li3: • Circumvent, disable, or otherwise interfere with security-related features of the Services.
terms.p6_li4: • Use any information obtained to harass, abuse, or harm another person.
terms.p6_li5: • Upload or transmit viruses, Trojan horses, or any other material that interferes with any party's uninterrupted use of the Services.
terms.p6_li6: • Engage in any automated use of the system (scripts, robots, data mining).
terms.p6_li7: • Decipher, decompile, disassemble, or reverse engineer any software comprising the Services.
terms.p6_li8: • Use the Services as part of any effort to compete with us or to generate unauthorized commercial revenue.
terms.p7: The Services may contain links to other websites ("Third-Party Websites"). We do not investigate, monitor, or check the accuracy or completeness of these Third-Party Contents. If you decide to leave the Services and access Third-Party Websites, you do so at your own risk. We allow advertisers to display their advertisements in certain areas of the Services but simply provide the space and have no other relationship with advertisers.
terms.p8: We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to monitor the Services for violations and take appropriate legal action. We may terminate your use or delete any content you have posted at any time, without warning. If we terminate or suspend your account, you are prohibited from registering and creating a new account.
terms.p9: We reserve the right to change, modify, or remove the contents of the Services at any time. We cannot guarantee the Services will be available at all times. We may experience interruptions, delays, or errors. We reserve the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies, or omissions and to change or update information at any time, without prior notice.
terms.p10: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS. YOU AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES WILL BE AT YOUR SOLE RISK. WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. WE DO NOT WARRANT THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF THE CONTENT.
terms.p11: IN NO EVENT WILL WE OR OUR DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES. OUR LIABILITY TO YOU WILL AT ALL TIMES BE LIMITED TO THE LESSER OF THE AMOUNT PAID, IF ANY, BY YOU TO US DURING THE ONE (1) MONTH PERIOD PRIOR TO ANY CAUSE OF ACTION ARISING OR $20.00 USD.
terms.p12: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold us harmless from and against any loss, damage, liability, claim, or demand made by any third party due to or arising out of: (1) your Contributions; (2) use of the Services; (3) breach of these Legal Terms; (4) any breach of your representations and warranties; or (5) your violation of the rights of a third party.
terms.p13: We care about data privacy and security. Please review our Privacy Policy. We will maintain certain data that you transmit to the Services for the purpose of managing the performance of the Services. You agree that we shall have no liability to you for any loss or corruption of any such data.
terms.p14: Visiting the Services, sending us emails, and completing online forms constitute electronic communications. You consent to receive electronic communications. YOU HEREBY AGREE TO THE USE OF ELECTRONIC SIGNATURES, CONTRACTS, ORDERS, AND OTHER RECORDS.
terms.p15: These Legal Terms and your use of the Services are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Delaware (United States), without regard to its conflict of law principles.
terms.p16: The Parties agree to first attempt to negotiate any dispute informally for at least thirty (30) days. If the Dispute is not resolved through informal negotiations, it will be resolved finally and exclusively by binding arbitration. The arbitration will take place in Delaware. The Parties agree that the arbitration shall be limited to the Dispute between the Parties individually.
terms.p17: These Legal Terms constitute the entire agreement and understanding between you and us. Our failure to exercise or enforce any right or provision shall not operate as a waiver of such right. If any provision is determined to be unlawful, void, or unenforceable, that provision is deemed severable. No joint venture, partnership, employment, or agency relationship is created between you and us.
terms.p18:
To resolve a complaint regarding the Services or to receive further information, please contact us at:

Email: info@rizzflows.com
Company: ADSEGOM LTD

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Rizzflows (operated by ADSEGOM LTD), we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.sh1a_li1: • Account Information: When you register, we collect your name and email address. This data is managed by a secure third-party authentication provider.
privacy.sh1a_li2: • User Content: We collect the text inputs and screenshots/images you upload to the App for analysis to generate replies.
privacy.sh1b_li1: • Usage Data: We may collect anonymous data about how you use the App (e.g., features used, frequency) to improve our services.
privacy.sh1b_li2: • Device Information: Information about your device type and operating system to ensure compatibility.
privacy.p2_li1: • Provide, maintain, and improve the Rizzflows App.
privacy.p2_li2: • Process AI Requests: Text and images you upload are sent to third-party AI providers solely for the purpose of generating the response (e.g., pickup lines or replies).
privacy.p2_li4: • Respond to your comments and support requests via email.
privacy.p3: We do not sell your personal data. We share data only as necessary to provide the Service:
privacy.p3_li1: • AI Providers: The text and images you submit for analysis are transmitted to our generative AI partners. These inputs are used strictly for processing your request.
privacy.p3_li2: • Backend Infrastructure: Your user profile and authentication data are stored securely on third-party backend services.
privacy.p3_li3: • Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights.
privacy.p4: When you upload a screenshot for analysis:
privacy.p4_li1: • The image is converted to a data format and transmitted securely to the AI provider for momentary processing.
privacy.p4_li2: • ADSEGOM LTD does not permanently store your uploaded conversation screenshots on our own servers after the analysis is complete.
privacy.p4_li3: • We retain your account information (email, name) as long as your account is active.
privacy.p5: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information. Access to your account is secured via robust authentication methods. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.p6: You may request the deletion of your account and associated data at any time by using the "Delete Account" feature within the app (if available) or by contacting us directly at info@rizzflows.com.
privacy.p7: Rizzflows is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, we will delete it immediately.
privacy.p8: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
privacy.p9: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
